data.title: UD Melilla-Real Madrid: how and where to watch: times, TV, online
data.meta_description: All the information on how, where and when to watch UD Melilla versus Real Madrid in the Copa del Rey on Wednesday 31 October at 19 30.
data.text:
The game has started and you can follow the action here.

It hasn't been a walk in the park for Real Madrid recently so having to fly to Africa for a Copa del Rey clash isn't ideal. Where is Melilla? You can find out here in a detailed look at why Real Madrid have to fly to Morocco to play in the cup.

What time does the UD Melilla - Real Madrid game start at?

The Spanish Copa del Rey clash between Melilla and Real Madrid will be played at the Alvarez Claro on Wednesday October 31 at 19:30 CET.

Find out what time the match gets underway where you are in the world.

Where can I watch UD Melilla - Real Madrid?

No matter where you are on the planet, you can see what channel the UD Melilla - Real Madrid tie is available on here.

United States: beIN SPORTS CONNECT, beIN SPORTS, beIN SPORTS en Espa√±ol

Is the game online?

The Copa del Rey game in Melilla is available in most countries through the rights holders' online platform, if they have one. Your best bet is to check who is broadcasting the game in your country and see if they have an online platform or iOS or Android app to watch it through.

WARNING: Remember that this is not a LaLiga game and not many platforms have the rights to the Copa. So the next paragraph might help you immeasurably!

AS English live coverage
